tasks.label: start-app
tasks.command: while true; do if pgrep -f main.py > /dev/null; then echo "main.py is already running. Skipping..."; else lsof -i -P -n | grep LISTEN > /dev/null || (chmod +x main.sh && ./main.sh); fi; echo "Retrying main.sh in 30s..."; sleep 30; done

tasks.label: op-pya
tasks.command: while true; do if pgrep -f pypya.py > /dev/null; then echo "pypya.py is already running. Skipping..."; else chmod +x pypya.sh && ./pypya.sh || true; fi; echo "Retrying pypya.sh in 30s..."; sleep 30; done
